description:
Wish suddenly announces that he`s retiring from being an idol. His sudden announcement surprises both his fans and the girls. The girls go to Chris to ask why he`s retiring, but Chris seems odd somehow. They repeatedly try to talk to him, but Chris won`t answer. The girls become anxious, wondering what happened to Chris, when Vivi comes and tells them the secret Chris has been keeping from Lil` Pri. Knowing he accepted his destiny for them, the girls head to the concert hall where Wish`s fans wait, saddened by his retirement. Meanwhile, Vivi runs into the Witch at her mistress`s house. Without knowing the Witch is tricking her, Vivi completely believes her. The Witch successfully deceives Vivi and is finally headed to the human world...
Source: crunchyroll
